meanings.definition: In a way that holds one's complete attention or interest.
meanings.sent1: She watched the movie engrossingly, not wanting to miss a single moment.
meanings.sent2: The book was so engrossingly written that she finished it in one sitting.
meanings.sent3: He stared engrossingly at the painting, trying to decipher its hidden meaning.
meanings.sent4: The music enveloped her engrossingly, transporting her to another world.
meanings.sent5: The mystery novel was engrossingly captivating, keeping her up all night.

meanings.definition: In a manner that absorbs all of one's time or energy.
meanings.sent1: She worked engrossingly on her project, losing track of time.
meanings.sent2: The video game was so engrossingly addictive that he played for hours.
meanings.sent3: He cooked engrossingly, forgetting to add salt to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The task demanded her attention engrossingly, leaving no room for distractions.
meanings.sent5: The movie marathon was engrossingly exhausting, but she enjoyed every minute of it.
